title: Topic 003 Question 029
body: You have an Azure IoT solution.
You prepare a new Azure IoT Edge device for deployment to the solution.
You need to ensure that the device is configured to meet Azure best practices.
options: From the IoT Edge device, run the iotedge check command.
From the IoT Edge device, run the iotedge logs edgeAgent and iotedge logs edgeHub commands.
From Azure Cloud Shell, run the Get-AzSecurityCompliance cmdlet.
From Azure Cloud Shell, run the az iot edge deployment show command.
